segments.text: All right then , Ms . Montgomery . I ’ ll get those plans over to your office by Thursday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . That will give me time to talk with my staff before I make final decision .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s what I was thinking . I ’ ll have them there by Thursday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good news . Thanks for getting things done so quickly .
segments.speaker: S2
